_aChangeLog.text: Map includes Bonuszones, Endzone and CP's, I forgot to add a Startzone, so you might want to add that manually

_sText:
*** MaxVel is 4000!***

This is my newest and second map surf_salvation!
It is a Tier 5 Linear with 2 Bonuses.
Bonus 1 by snc
Bonus 2 by SpyComplex

This map was made for Caffrey. I messaged him a while back and asked him if he would find it cool having a map made with a surf style he really likes. Therefore the surf on this map is made in agreement with Caffrey. I really hope he likes it and you do too!
Check out his streams on https://www.twitch.tv/caffrey

The name Salvation stands from a TV-Show we both really like but got discontinued after Season 2. A "Noah" type rocket named Salvation is the main focus in that Show. That's why the theme is space.

Excuse the small but noticable lighting/shadows "bugs" on some ramps. I ran into them alot and in the end decided it's not that big of a deal, I hope you can look over them :p

Hope you enjoy! -Danger
